choices: Let’s keep going down the list
1.content: You wake up after a long nights sleep at toriel’s home in the ruins. “Man that was a good nights sleep”. You say to yourself. You then tell Toriel that you are heading out into the ruins to play with some of your monster friends. As you are walking through the ruins you find a mysterious potion that is glowing a pink color with a hint of purple in it. “Hu what’s this”? You say as you pick up the potion. You then proceed to drink the potion. “Mmmmm it taists like grape”. You then get a huge headache. You then black out and when you wake you realize your not in your body anymore. Who’s body are you now in?
1.title: A weird day in the underground

choices: Maybe your in a lesser monster’s body
15.content: What other monsters body could you be stuck in?
15.title: Let’s keep going down the list

info.description: You are the main protagonist of the story frisk the human and you find a postion in the ruins that makes you swap bodies with a random monster in the underground
